messages.subject: Mimawarigumi
messages.msgSnippet: Just thought I d let everyone know-- having come into posession of several new sources of information, I am compiling a report on the Mimawarigumi for the
messages.messageBody:
Just thought I'd let everyone know-- having come into posession of several
new sources of information, I am compiling a report on the Mimawarigumi for
the website. Also, as promised earlier, I will be preparing a comparative
chart of Shinsengumi, Mimawarigumi, and related groups' (such as Aizu)
uniforms and flags.

Back to work for me!!

--M.
